name: Bug Catching Simulator
description:
Welcome to Bug Catching Simulator! (version 1.1) a game where you catch bugs....

thats it

sorry im not a very good dev ;-;

update log:

version 1, aug 16: release!

version 1.1, aug 17: bug fixes

controls:

WASD/ ARROW KEYS to move

SPACE to use the net

to talk to the trader, you need to press the same number as the next net you get

(ex: if you need the 2nd net next (red) you press 2)

if u want to play on mobile, you're gonna need a, a. a Bluetooth keyboard. or b. an adapter and a normal keyboard
